medical_history.chief_complaint: Increasingly severe right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Approximately 1 week of intermittent, sharp, severe RUQ pain radiating to the back. The patient has experienced similar pain episodes in the past, but they were transient and not of this severity.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past medical history includes GERD, gastritis, and SVT as a child with subsequent ablation and tonsillectomy.
